item.title: Docker Swarm on ARM
item.description: Overview So, a couple years ago when I was studying my bachelors, I did a project for an operating systems course on the ARM big little architecture and scheduling algorithms (You can even read my final paper here). Fast forward a couple years, and I’ve still got some ARM boards floating around - After doing some reading into Docker Swarm, I thought I’d try it out without virtualizing everything on my main box.
